      • async

        public BarrierSpec async(boolean async)
        Description copied from class: ConsumerEndpointSpec
        Allow async replies. If the handler reply is a ListenableFuture send the output when it is satisfied rather than sending the future as the result. Only subclasses that support this feature should set it.
        Overrides:
        async in class ConsumerEndpointSpec<BarrierSpec,org.springframework.integration.aggregator.BarrierMessageHandler>
        Parameters:
        async - true to allow.
        Returns:
        the endpoint spec.
        See Also:
        AbstractMessageProducingHandler.setAsync(boolean)
